column2: BRIEF-Crown Holdings Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.67 April 18 (Reuters) - Crown Holdings Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $625 MILLION FOR 2018 AND $775 MILLION FOR 2019 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.42 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.21 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
